title: Solving Language Education Field Problems Using System Dynamics Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic language education theories and elementary-level teaching experience
context.additional_context: A process for elementary school teachers to structure complex language education challenges using system dynamics simulation and explore resolution strategies

learning_goals: Learners can represent core problem factors in language education settings (e.g., student engagement, learning gaps) using a system dynamics model.
Learners can analyze simulation results to concretely propose strategies for revising educational plans.
Learners can develop and present field-applicable language education improvement plans through team-based projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
